abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A holy symbol, a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 15 gp

abilities.title: Feature: Shelter of the Faithful
abilities.description: You command the respect of those who share your faith. You can perform religious ceremonies of your deity. You and your companions can receive free healing and care at a temple, shrine, or other established presence of your faith.

abilities.title: Equipment
abilities.description: A set of fine clothes, a disguise kit, tools of the con of your choice (ten stoppered bottles filled with colored liquid, a set of weighted dice, a deck of marked cards, or a signet ring of an imaginary duke), and a pouch containing 15 gp

abilities.title: Feature: False Identity
abilities.description: You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises that allow you to assume that persona.
